column1: '''The Ambarkanta''' is the fifth chapter of ''[[The Shaping of Middle-earth]]''. The chapter includes the text "Ambarkanta: The Shape of the World" (attributed to [[Rúmil (elf of Tirion)

Developed during the 1930s, according the [[Christopher Tolkien]], the Ambarkanta represents the "next phase" of the cosmology after the earlier world decribed in the ''[[Book of Lost Tales]]''.<ref>{{LT1
